definitions.definition: The act of inundating ; an overflow ; a flood ; a rising and spreading of water over grounds .
The state of being inundated ; flooding .
An overflowing or superfluous abundance ; a flood ; a great influx .
examples: There is an inundation of tourists in summer, but in winter the town is almost deserted.

main_definition: The act of inundating ; an overflow ; a flood ; a rising and spreading of water over grounds .
secondary_definitions: The state of being inundated ; flooding .
( figurative ) An overflowing or superfluous abundance ; a flood ; a great influx .
